metadata.synopsis:
Conversation with an adventurer who has been tortured. The player may or may not have participated in the torture. The adventurer is hurt, tired, and broken.
Note for mocap recording: the tortured adventurer can say most of his lines chained on a bed or free (standing up). Please record everything standing up. Cinematics will handle the lying down state.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe debugbookset quest flags & optionact 1GOB- Goblin CampTortured Adventurer4. Persuade the torturer and teleport me to the adventurer5. Talk to adventurer

1.speaker: Liam
1.text: Get - get away from me! Please! D-don't hurt me!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer is free, but barely standing. He shrinks away from the player.InternalNodeContext: If the player frees the adventurer after torturing him, without talking to him before.NodeContext: intense fear. The player has tortured the adventurer before,

313.speaker: Player
313.text: The pain stops when you answer my questions.
313.context: NodeContext: afraid and panicking. He's afraid the player will torture him som emore.

321.speaker: Liam
321.text: P-please! You kn-know where the grove is! Th-there's nothing I can tell you... please, let me go!
321.context: NodeContext: afraid and panicking. He's afraid the player will torture him som emore.

133.speaker: Player
133.text: I'm sorry - but it was the only way to help you.
133.context: NodeContext: incredulous and angry. incredulous and angry. The player tortured him, and now says it was necessary.

75.speaker: Liam
75.text: Help? You... you could have killed me!
75.context: NodeContext: incredulous and angry. incredulous and angry. The player tortured him, and now says it was necessary.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Remira sent me. She said you were in trouble.
93.context: NodeContext: a tone of hope. He's starting to believe you are here to save him and he's heard the first good news in a while.

326.speaker: Liam
326.text: Remira? She's... she's alive then. Oh, thank the gods. I - I need to get out of here.
326.context: NodeContext: a tone of hope. He's starting to believe you are here to save him and he's heard the first good news in a while.

108.speaker: Player
108.context: NodeContext: He trails off, almost hyperventilating.

113.speaker: Liam
113.text: I... I don't think I can move my arm.
113.context: NodeContext: He trails off, almost hyperventilating.

268.speaker: Liam
268.text: This wasn't supposed to happen. It should have been easy...
268.context: NodeContext: He trails off, almost hyperventilating.

6.speaker: Liam
6.text: And now they know about the grove. Gods. I - I need to warn them!

246.speaker: Player
246.text: You came looking for the Nightsong, didn't you?
246.context: CinematicNodeContext: He trails off, large, unfocussed eyes staring at the ground.NodeContext: he trails off, lost in the memory of the goblins attacking and overpowering them.

223.speaker: Liam
223.text: Y-yes, it should be here somewhere. They said there was a hidden passage underneath this temple.
223.context: CinematicNodeContext: He trails off, large, unfocussed eyes staring at the ground.NodeContext: he trails off, lost in the memory of the goblins attacking and overpowering them.

49.speaker: Liam
49.text: The place was supposed to be abandoned, b-but when we arrived...
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: He trails off, large, unfocussed eyes staring at the ground.NodeContext: he trails off, lost in the memory of the goblins attacking and overpowering them.

277.speaker: Player
277.text: What else do you know about the temple? Any other treasure?
277.context: NodeContext: The player asked him about secret passages in the temple, but he doesn't know where they are, only that they exist.

148.speaker: Liam
148.text: I'm not sure - all I know is there's a p-passageway to the Nightsong.
148.context: NodeContext: The player asked him about secret passages in the temple, but he doesn't know where they are, only that they exist.

158.speaker: Liam
158.text: B-Brian had instructions, but... the g-goblins got him. Th-they said they'd e-eat him...
158.context: NodeContext: he's shuddering at the memory and realizes this could be his fate as well.

228.speaker: Liam
228.text: I... I have to go. I have to get out of here.
228.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer isn't shackled anymore.NodeContext: panicked - he's afraid he'll be eaten by goblins if he stays here.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: One more question: what happened to the druid?
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer isn't shackled anymore.NodeContext: still a lingering fear, though he's a little calmer here.

152.speaker: Liam
152.text: Halsin? I... I don't know. He changed into a bear, but... I lost sight of him. I don't know if he's s-still alive.
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer isn't shackled anymore.NodeContext: still a lingering fear, though he's a little calmer here.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: The Nightsong. What does it do, exactly?

185.speaker: Player
185.text: I came for the Nightsong. Where is it?

259.speaker: Liam
259.text: S-somewhere underneath the temple. There's a hidden p-passage.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: How did you end up on that rack?

257.speaker: Liam
257.text: We... I was w-with a group of adventurers. We came here for an artefact.

56.speaker: Liam
56.text: It's called th-the Nightsong. We tried to s-sneak past the goblins...
56.context: NodeContext: Shuddering at the memory. These goblins behaved differently than the ones he's used to fighting, and overpowered his party.

279.speaker: Liam
279.text: ... b-but they ambushed us. I didn't think a pack of goblins could be so... so efficient.
279.context: NodeContext: Shuddering at the memory. These goblins behaved differently than the ones he's used to fighting, and overpowered his party.

174.speaker: Player
174.text: An artefact? What does it do?
174.context: NodeContext: He's a little puzzled by the fact that the goblins didn't know bout the artifact in the temple.

276.speaker: Liam
276.text: I don't know. The boss didn't say.

258.speaker: Liam
258.text: He j-just said some wizard called Lorroakan would reward us if we found it.

171.speaker: Liam
171.text: It should be here somewhere. He said there was a hidden passage underneath the temple.

249.speaker: Player
249.text: Where are the goblins hiding it?
249.context: NodeContext: He's a little puzzled by the fact that the goblins didn't know bout the artifact in the temple.

283.speaker: Liam
283.text: Th-they didn't hide it. I don't think they even kn-know it exists.
283.context: NodeContext: He's a little puzzled by the fact that the goblins didn't know bout the artifact in the temple.

222.speaker: Liam
222.text: I-it was locked away years ago, somewhere underneath the temple.

168.speaker: Player
168.text: The druid Halsin was with you. Where is he now?

309.speaker: Liam
309.text: I... I don't know. He changed into a bear, but... I lost sight of him. I don't know if he's s-still alive.

288.speaker: Player
288.text: You mentioned the Nightsong. Where can I find it?

331.speaker: Player
331.text: Go on. Where can I find the Nightsong?

164.speaker: Player
164.text: It was the only way to get the goblins to leave.
164.context: NodeContext: Desperate and incredulous - the player told him the only way to get rid of the goblins was to torture Liam.

30.text: Y-you could've killed them! Just... just leave, please!
30.context: NodeContext: Desperate and incredulous - the player told him the only way to get rid of the goblins was to torture Liam.

77.speaker: Liam
77.text: Y-you could've killed them! Just... just leave, please!
77.context: NodeContext: Desperate and incredulous - the player told him the only way to get rid of the goblins was to torture Liam.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: And yet you're still alive. Stop whining.
161.context: NodeContext: He isn't happy, but just wants to get this over with.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Might be tempted - unless you do as I say.
70.context: NodeContext: He isn't happy, but just wants to get this over with.

86.speaker: Liam
86.text: Fine. Just... what do you want?
86.context: NodeContext: He isn't happy, but just wants to get this over with.

100.speaker: Liam
100.text: Fine. Just... what do you want?
100.context: NodeContext: He isn't happy, but just wants to get this over with.

96.text: Are you mad? Just... just leave, please!
96.context: NodeContext: The player told him that even though he tortured him, he's still alive, so he'd better be grateful.

264.speaker: Liam
264.text: Are you mad? Just... just leave, please!
264.context: NodeContext: The player told him that even though he tortured him, he's still alive, so he'd better be grateful.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: NodeContext: These are Liam's thoughts. The player has tortured him and told him it was for his own good, and he just wants the player to leave and see if he can escape.

301.speaker: Liam
301.text: Why won't she leave? I need to warn the others... and find Remira, if she's still alive.
301.context: NodeContext: These are Liam's thoughts. The player has tortured him and told him it was for his own good, and he just wants the player to leave and see if he can escape.

229.speaker: Liam
229.text: Why won't they leave? I need to warn the others... and find Remira, if she's still alive.
229.context: NodeContext: These are Liam's thoughts. The player has tortured him and told him it was for his own good, and he just wants the player to leave and see if he can escape.

238.text: What - what are you doing? G-get away from me!
238.context: NodeContext: Scared - after being tortured by the player and being told that it was for his own good, the player also tried to read his mind.

9.speaker: Liam
9.text: What - what are you doing? G-get away from me!
9.context: NodeContext: Scared - after being tortured by the player and being told that it was for his own good, the player also tried to read his mind.

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *The battered man lies crumpled on the ground, unconscious.*
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer is free, but barely standing.InternalNodeContext: If the player frees the adventurer.NodeContext: He's grateful. The player freed him.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Pour a healing potion into his mouth.

266.speaker: Narrator
266.text: *The man coughs hard, but his eyes shoot open and the colour returns to his cheeks.*

211.speaker: Liam

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Use the key to unlock his chains.
88.context: NodeContext: A sudden cry of pain and shock as the player breaks his thumb (in a bid to free him of his shackles)

290.speaker: Player
290.text: I can free you - if you're not afraid of a little pain.
290.context: NodeContext: A sudden cry of pain and shock as the player breaks his thumb (in a bid to free him of his shackles)

31.speaker: Liam

188.speaker: Player
188.context: NodeContext: Crying in pain as your thumb is broken

237.speaker: Liam
237.context: NodeContext: Crying in pain as your thumb is broken

236.speaker: Player
236.text: It was the only way. You should be able to slip your hand free.
236.context: NodeContext: Hope dampened by the realisation that there's more pain to come.

155.speaker: Liam
155.text: Y-you're... you're right! But now you've to do the other hand...
155.context: NodeContext: Hope dampened by the realisation that there's more pain to come.

205.speaker: Player

205.context: NodeContext: Nervous and in some pain

227.speaker: Liam

207.speaker: Liam

267.speaker: Liam

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *But was it truly nothing?  The pain gripped you tight, robbing you of all composure for a moment...*
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

296.speaker: Narrator
296.text: *Searing agony grips you. For a brief moment, you see another cell, elsewhere. You hesitate before a bound prisoner. A harsh voice demands you inflict pain, for Lady Shar...*
296.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.InternalNodeContext: Incurable wound imagery/memory fragment - SH remmebrs being chastised for not carrying out torture for Shar
